name: Tribals.io
description:
Tribals.io is a multiplayer survival game that will test your skills as you craft, mine, build and explore an island in search of the ultimate goal - survival. You can choose to team up with your friends or go at it alone, and the game offers a plethora of items, tools and weapons to craft and use in your journey. Gather resources, build bases, and keep your hunger and thirst levels in check, as the island is filled with surprises and dangers, from wild animals to all sorts of obstacles. See how long you can survive and become the best tribe in the island! Challenge yourself and others and explore the island, but be careful as the stakes are high and the risks even higher. Jump in and see if you have what it takes to conquer the island!

How to play Tribals.io

Movement: WASD

Jump: Space Bar

Main action: Left Mouse Button

Use microphone: Press T

Open inventory: Tab

Use text chat: Enter

Build menu: Right click
